channel.title: Squid / @squidbanduk
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @squidbanduk. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title:
RT by @squidbanduk: London – @squidbanduk play a special show at Somerset House next week joined by @ejthackray + more
+ support from Kai @mountkimbie (DJ) and Bar Italia
Friday 8 July → http://somersethouse.org.uk/whats-on/somerset-house-summer-series/squid
item.dc:creator: @WarpRecords
item.description:
London – @squidbanduk play a special show at Somerset House next week joined by @ejthackray + more

+ support from Kai @mountkimbie (DJ) and Bar Italia

Friday 8 July
→ somersethouse.org.uk/whats-o…

item.title: V pleased to announce that Bar Italia & Kai Campos (@mountkimbie) DJ will be supporting us at @SomersetHouse next Fri. We will also be joined by special guests @ejthackray, @Martha_Skye & FELIX for our set. This will be our only London show this year. Tix: https://linktr.ee/Squidbanduk
item.dc:creator: @squidbanduk
item.description: V pleased to announce that Bar Italia & Kai Campos (@mountkimbie) DJ will be supporting us at @SomersetHouse next Fri. We will also be joined by special guests @ejthackray, @Martha_Skye & FELIX for our set. This will be our only London show this year. Tix: linktr.ee/Squidbanduk

item.title:
Thanks to all the heads that turned up to the Park on Sat. We’d been waiting for years to have that moment & it was like no other. Such a pleasure to be a part of & forever remembered in the annals of @BBCiPlayer (for the next month) https://linktr.ee/Squidbanduk
@BBC6Music @bbcglasto
item.dc:creator: @squidbanduk
